# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $150. Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit you. Considering its worth, I propose a special introductory price of $135 for you. This is an exclusive offer tailored to appreciate your interest and support. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a valuable item at a discounted rate. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $135. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $135
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
